mapper.select: SELECT s.subj_group as subjGroup, s.subj_name as subjName, s.subj_score as subjScore, d.dept_name as deptName, s.subj_professor as subjProfessor, lect_date as lectDate, lect_start as lectStart, lect_end as lectEnd, lect_room as lectRoom FROM registers r, departmentes d, subjects s WHERE r.subject_no = s.subject_no AND s.department_no = d.department_no AND student_id=#{studentId} AND r.reg_year=#{regYear} AND r.reg_semester=#{regSemester}
